name: Inseparable: A Goat and Frog Adventure
name_original: Inseparable: A Goat and Frog Adventure
description:
This was a game made for GMTK Jam 2021 with the theme “Joined Together.”

Join the adventures of a Goat and Frog with their newfound powers of FRIENDSHIP (not magnets).

Controls:

WASD or Left Analogue – Frog Movement

Q or Left Shoulder – Frog Pull

E or Left Trigger – Frog Tongue

IKJL or Right Analogue – Goat Movement

U or Right Shoulder – Goat Pull

O or Right Trigger – Goat Headbutt

For fun and chaos, play with a friend. Controller recommended.

Credits:

Aaron Colledge / Design “I like the frog.”

Justin Beasley / Engines “I like the goat.”

Daniel Smedley / Art “Not even gorgonzola?!”

Rachel Lablaine / Art “Comment redacted.”

Becky Farr / Art “Aaaaaaaaa!”

Ivy Albury / Music “Armadillos are cool.”
